info.title: Dispo API Endpoint Definitions
info.description: Allows interactive support for Dispo API endpoints.

get.summary: Get rerun report
Get all Annotations for a specific resolution Type for the DisposionableItem

parameters.name: itemId
parameters.description: The Id of the Dispositionable Item

404.description: Not Found. Could not find any Annotations

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: The name of the Source File to search for

parameters.name: fileNumber
parameters.description: The file number to search for

404.description: Not Found. Could not find source file

get.summary: Post Dispo Set export given a primary Set

post.summary: Create a new Disposition Set given a name

409.description: Conflict. Tried to create a Disposition Set with same name

400.description: Bad Request. Did not provide both a Name and a valid Import Path

put.summary: Import All Disposition Sets that are in a given Branch and State. Default state is "NONE"

404.description: Not Found. Can't connect to server

404.description: Not Found. Could not find any Branch/Set ID
